segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting

segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting

segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting

segment.source: You can use the following procedures in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console to specify the duration (in months) of Application Virtualization System usage information you want to store in the database.
segment.target: You can use the following procedures in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console to specify the duration (in months) of Application Virtualization System usage information you want to store in the database.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To store usage information, you must select the Log Usage Information check box on the Provider Pipeline tab.
segment.target: To store usage information, you must select the Log Usage Information check box on the Provider Pipeline tab.

segment.source: To display this tab, right-click the provider policy in the Provider Policies Results pane and select Properties.
segment.target: To display this tab, right-click the provider policy in the Provider Policies Results pane and select Properties.

segment.source: To set up usage reporting
segment.target: To set up usage reporting

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization System node in the left pane, and select System Options.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization System node in the left pane, and select System Options.

segment.source: Select the Database tab.
segment.target: Select the Database tab.

segment.source: Select the Keep Usage For (Months) or Keep All Usage radio button.
segment.target: Select the Keep Usage For (Months) or Keep All Usage radio button.

segment.source: If you choose to specify usage duration in months, enter a number from 1 to 120 (default value is 6 months).
segment.target: If you choose to specify usage duration in months, enter a number from 1 to 120 (default value is 6 months).

segment.source: If you select Keep All Usage, the database will grow until it reaches the specified size limit.
segment.target: If you select Keep All Usage, the database will grow until it reaches the specified size limit.

segment.source: Click Apply or OK.
segment.target: Click Apply or OK.

segment.source: To disable usage reporting
segment.target: To disable usage reporting

segment.source: Click the Provider Policies node.
segment.target: Click the Provider Policies node.

segment.source: Right-click Provider Policy and select Properties.
segment.target: Right-click Provider Policy and select Properties.

segment.source: Select the Provider Pipeline tab.
segment.target: Select the Provider Pipeline tab.

segment.source: Clear the Log Usage Information check box.
segment.target: Clear the Log Usage Information check box.

segment.source: Click Apply or OK.
segment.target: Click Apply or OK.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console
